name: Talos VR
description: Talos" is a realistic and doomsday style of VR, which combines the characteristics of vehicles, robots and a large number of firearms. Can you survive in this doomsday world as a surviving mecha driver, driving Phaethon against Talos?
minimum_requirements: OS: windows10 Processor: Intel  i3-3220 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX970 Storage: 70 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows10 Processor: Intel  i5-4590 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX1070 Storage: 70 GB available space
